message: And yet no one cares. They've been playing this song since the Bush admin. Step one: place quote by anonymous source in paper of record (ie Wall St Journal). Step two: quote said paper of record (the Wall St Journal said today...) but leave out the context, turning anon source into quotable fact. Step three: repeat quickly and often. Step four: marginalize and ignore your critics. Your move, Media Matters.
John, amazing! I would be interested to read how the messages are isolated.

This is where Liberalism, and the subsequent desire for a nanny state, fails. It is not the government's job to babysit us. We have our own liberty in this nation, at least for now, and we are to exercise it. It is indeed unfortunate that mental illness played a factor here, but unless someone reaches out for help, or a family member were to commit her for evaluation, there is not really much the city could (or should) do.
